Activity: Log in, check emails, and assess the efficiency of the bug tracking tool based on the current week's experience.
Conduct a quick survey amongst the team regarding their experience with the bug tracking tool and any improvements needed.
Analyze the survey results and prepare a report outlining the successes and challenges faced during the implementation of the bug tracking tool.
Present findings to the team and discuss potential updates or changes to the bug reporting process.
Wrap up the week and prepare for next week's tasks, ensuring all bug reports are logged and handled appropriately.
